entities.name: geour
entities.description: Geour remains shut up in his office all day. This implies that Geour is a person who works from home or has an office.

entities.name: Mrs. Weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley magicked her empty plates onto the work surface and served apple tart. This shows that Mrs. Weasley is a person with magical abilities.

entities.name: Fleur
entities.description: Fleur said 'For ze wedding,' she added, when he looked confused. This implies that Fleur is a person who is involved in the wedding planning.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry gathered that she still suspected Hagrid. This shows that Harry is a person who is aware of the situation and has some knowledge about it.

entities.name: Hagrid
entities.description: It was mentioned that Mrs. Weasley still suspected Hagrid. This implies that Hagrid is a person who is being suspected by Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley asked Ron if he had cleaned out his room yet. This shows that Ron is a person who lives in the house and has a room to clean.

relationships.description: Fleur said 'For ze wedding,' she added, when he looked confused. This implies that Fleur suspects Harry about something.
It was mentioned that Mrs. Weasley still suspected Hagrid. This shows that Mrs. Weasley has suspicions about Hagrid.
Mrs. Weasley asked Ron if he had cleaned out his room yet. This shows that Mrs. Weasley is asking Ron to do something.
